data.message:
there is no graviton particle...
there is no dark energy particle...
there is no dark matter particle...
you cannot even produce firsthand photos of any curvature...

emenim your faith in government propaganda and government tall tales is in no way proof of the imaginary globe that you "see in your head"....

 science has spoken:
the globehead cult is magical nonsense.., invented for population control and geographical control...

The United Nations is behind this psyop...
